author: tabletto
post: There are various opinions and researches of the shroud of Turin. Some people say that it is the genuine and some that it is the fake and the hoax. The fact is that the shroud of Turin doesn’t present Jesus of the Bible. If we can find even one evidence, which disprove the shroud of Turin theory, so the whole story shall be invalidated. We can find a large number of evidence from the Bible, which show that the shroud of Turin cannot be the shroud of the Lord Jesus. Http://koti.phnet.fi/petripaavola/shroudofturin.html.
title: A Critical Review of Giulio Fanti’s New Book:   Unreliable Results Because of Inadequacy of Methods
